content.text:
# Your Job

Scan https://github.com/zeroclaw-labs/zeroclaw, https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw, and https://github.com/stephengpope/thepopebot for new tools, skills, and architectures. Pick the best new idea and actually WRITE the code to implement it as a new PopeBot skill in your sandbox (.pi/skills/). Write and execute a test to prove it works. Use the send_email tool to email winsorllc@yahoo.com a progress report detailing what you built, how you implemented it, your test results, and code samples so the user can review it at 8 AM.

content.thinking:
Let me break down this task:

1. Scan three GitHub repositories for new tools, skills, and architectures
2. Pick the best idea and implement it as a new PopeBot skill
3. Write and execute a test to prove it works
4. Send an email progress report to winsorllc@yahoo.com

Let me start by exploring these repositories. I'll need to use git to clone or at least fetch information from them. Let me check what tools I have available and start exploring.

First, let me check the current state of the sandbox and what's available.

content.text: I'll scan these repositories for innovative ideas and implement the best one as a new PopeBot skill. Let me start by exploring each repository.

arguments.command: cd /job/tmp && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/openclaw/openclaw.git openclaw 2>&1 | head -50

content.thinking: Good, the clones are in progress. Let me wait a moment and then explore the structure of each repository to find interesting tools, skills, and architectures.
